embeds.title: 📦 Addon Manager & Required Addons
embeds.description: These are **mandatory** for raiding with Compulsion. Make sure you’re set up before raid night!

fields.name: 🧰 Addon Manager
fields.value: [WowUp](https://wowup.io/) — Recommended addon manager (choose the CurseForge-supported version!)

fields.name: ✅ Required Addons
fields.value:
➤ [DBM](https://www.curseforge.com/wow/addons/dbm-raidleadtools) or [BigWigs](https://www.curseforge.com/wow/addons/big-wigs) + [LittleWigs](https://www.curseforge.com/wow/addons/little-wigs)
  ↪ Don’t forget expansion packages
➤ [Details](https://www.curseforge.com/wow/addons/details) — Combat metrics (DPS, HPS, interrupts, deaths)
➤ [Raider.IO](https://www.curseforge.com/wow/addons/raiderio) — Raid & M+ rankings
  ↪ Companion to [raider.io](https://raider.io)

embeds.title: ⭐ Recommended Addons
embeds.description: These addons improve performance, visibility, and quality of life. Highly encouraged for all members.

fields.name: 💡 Combat & UI
fields.value:
➤ [GTFO](https://www.curseforge.com/wow/addons/gtfo) — Damage zone alerts
➤ [OmniCD](https://www.curseforge.com/wow/addons/omnicd) — Party cooldown tracker
➤ [Plater](https://www.curseforge.com/wow/addons/plater-nameplates) — Nameplate replacement
➤ [WeakAuras](https://www.curseforge.com/wow/addons/weakauras-2) — Custom alerts
  ↪ [Luxthos Class Auras](https://www.curseforge.com/wow/weakaura/luxthos-warrior-core)

fields.name: 🧠 Strategy & Sim Tools
fields.value:
➤ [Mythic Dungeon Tools](https://www.curseforge.com/wow/addons/mythic-dungeon-tools) — M+ strategy planner
➤ [Simulationcraft](https://www.curseforge.com/wow/addons/simulationcraft) — Gear simming
➤ [Spec BiS Tooltip](https://www.curseforge.com/wow/addons/spec-bis-tooltip) — Shows BiS items per spec
➤ [Talent Tree Tweaks](https://www.curseforge.com/wow/addons/talent-tree-tweaks) — Talent UI upgrades

embeds.title: 💎 Awesome Addons
embeds.description: These are community favorites for immersion, crafting, and UI upgrades. Try them out and find your favorites!

fields.name: 🎨 UI & Immersion
fields.value:
➤ [ElvUI](https://www.tukui.org/download.php?ui=elvui) — Full UI replacement
  ↪ [ToxiUI](https://www.curseforge.com/wow/addons/toxiui) — ElvUI skin (Chris-approved!)
➤ [DialogUI](https://www.curseforge.com/wow/addons/dialogui) — NPC interaction overhaul
➤ [Narcissus](https://www.curseforge.com/wow/addons/narcissus) — Character panel upgrade
➤ [Plumber](https://www.curseforge.com/wow/addons/plumber) — UI enhancements

fields.name: 🛠️ Crafting & Utility
fields.value:
➤ [CraftScan](https://www.curseforge.com/wow/addons/craftscan) — Public order tracking
➤ [Farmer](https://www.curseforge.com/wow/addons/farmer) — Farming visibility tools
➤ [Train All](https://www.curseforge.com/wow/addons/train-all) — Profession training QOL
➤ [Premade Groups Filter](https://www.curseforge.com/wow/addons/premade-groups-filter) — LFG filter upgrades
➤ [Silver Dragon](https://www.curseforge.com/wow/addons/silver-dragon) — Rare mob alerts
